website_summaries.verdict: Simple molds produce quality, uniform gummy bears every time.
pros: Durable, multi-colored trays are affordable and easy to use
Thick trays are flexible and allow gummies to pop out with ease
Flat surface makes it easy to scrape away excess liquid for perfectly uniform bears
cons: Gummy bear faces have minimal detail

customer_reviews.title: Bought these to make some gummy bears. I've purchased ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to make some gummy bears. I've purchased a few different molds in the past, and I've come across two types. There are thinner, cheaper ones that have a lip on the edge, making filling a bit more difficult when using a scraper. Then there are these ones, which are made of thicker rubber, and have a completely flat back. This is the kind I prefer, 5 stars, will probably buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Human Being

customer_reviews.title: ... make gummy bear shaped ice cubes and they worked like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I decided to use these to make gummy bear shaped ice cubes and they worked like a charm! Froze much fast than normal ice cubes and with so many of them I knew I would never return to using regular ice cubes again
customer_reviews.author: Brian mermelstein

customer_reviews.title: Cute Gummie Bears!
customer_reviews.text: I made Elderberry Gummies and these molds worked out GREAT!! Easy to fill with dropper and super easy to pop out. My only disappointment was the size of the bears, but that’s my fault for not looking at the specifications. Otherwise...great product!
customer_reviews.author: rjv4EVER

customer_reviews.title: They were easy to fill with the dropper and popped out easily
customer_reviews.text: Used these to make cinnamon gummies. They were easy to fill with the dropper and popped out easily! Made 1 cup and had extra after filling all three molds. Probably would have been able to do one more mold with the one cup so will probably order another set just to make it easier to do all at once.
customer_reviews.author: CHERYL GRAEVE

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for elderberry gummies
customer_reviews.text: Used these to make elderberry gummies. They're very small but adorable! I didn't even have to grease them.
customer_reviews.author: M Molina

customer_reviews.title: Wish it came with 4 molds.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. 4 stars because a 4 pack would be better. Note most recipes call for 1 cup of juice need 4 molds, 3 is too small and the fluid sets up before you can get a mold cleared to use.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Great for homemade gummy bears
customer_reviews.text: Great for making gummy bears at home. Easy to pop out candy and cleans easily. Dropper was useful for filling.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Kunzelman

customer_reviews.title: The molds are great, easy to use and work as expected
customer_reviews.text: The molds are great, easy to use and work as expected. The entire mold is a bit smaller than I anticipated, and the bears themselves are smaller than the standard ones you get at the store.
customer_reviews.author: callie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality - Amazing price!
customer_reviews.text: I used this to make gummy bears (obviously!). I have been on keto for a few months so trying to shake things up. I was worried these molds would be too good to be true based on this price compared to the much higher prices from other sellers. These are GREAT! My gummy bears popped right out with no problem. Very easy to clean too but requires very little cleaning since everything pops out no problem. The dropper is an extremely helpful addition and I couldn't imagine getting the mix into the molds before it cooled without it.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: Effective and reusable.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Worked well. Thicker than expected, but will likely last longer as a result. :) They also emailed me to ensure I'd received them and was satisfied, which I appreciate in any online retailer.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Jelinek

customer_reviews.title: Strong chemical odor and country of manufacture is unknown
customer_reviews.text: I’m updating my previous review because I have since found the molds to have a pretty strong smell that doesn’t dissipate after washing multiple times. I looked for a country of manufacture but didn’t find one. I’ve decided not to use the molds and have thrown them out because I’m too concerned with the chemical smell that won't dissipate and the mystery of the manufacturing country. I’ve since ordered a different set of molds from a known manufacturer "Modern Gummy" which I've used several times now - no smell at all, much higher quality and much more detail, definition and depth to the bear molds.
customer_reviews.author: Coastalbaby

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The little bears pop right out of these molds. I like that the molds are small (less than half-tray) so they're easy to fit in the fridge. The dropper is perfect and easy to control.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Cute Mini Gummy Bears!
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can make my own gummies at home. The silicone makes it easy to pop out candy & also easy to clean! However I expected these to be bigger then the actual size. They're more of a "mini" gummy bear. With so many small molds to feel it did get a bit messy with some spillage. I do love silicone molds now, next time I will just go with a bigger size to suit me. These are perfect for little kids!
customer_reviews.author: Nadine Hadel

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: I thought the molds were abit bigger but any how im pleased with the product. Its very flexible which makes it easier to pop out the gummies. Fast delivery and im a happy customer!(:
customer_reviews.author: JUNE Holder

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I used these to make champagne jelly bears and they turned out so cute.
customer_reviews.author: ameeta

customer_reviews.title: Don’t like them
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan . Doesn’t pass the stretch test it. Waste of money . You can def purchase better ones. This is the second kind I have purchased & the first ones I bought were not comparable to these.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Great small mold
customer_reviews.text: Fits about 1ML per gummy mold. These were small so I got 2 sets as 1 pack of jello makes more than 150 if you are adding “Special” ingredients. Easy to clean and no need to apply non stick spray, they come out easily after they are cool.
customer_reviews.author: Keirster

customer_reviews.title: Some defects but good
customer_reviews.text: One tray had holes in about 5 of the bear molds but other than that they’ve been great. I used them to fill with veggie/fruit purée to freeze for my dogs. Once frozen, the bears pop out easily and throw them in dishwasher to clean.
customer_reviews.author: denisse rangel

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I am using this product to make candy and gummys....i was expecting the gummy bears to be at least real gummy bear size and they are WAY smaller. The product looks good and easy to use for like maybe some jello bears but the molds are way to small for hard candy or gummys.....but other than that, Product is okay. Just small than expected! Showed a picture of it compaired to my finger... My finger is bigger haha I gave this product a 2 star only because its not going to work for me in what i need it for....smaller than expected...
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: They were smaller bears than I expected but the description does show a size but I assumed it was normal gummy size. They did however work perfect for what I needed them for and the molds were very sturdy. I am glad I made this purchase. I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie D D

customer_reviews.title: WAY TOO SMALL
customer_reviews.text: Headline says it all didn't even open when I seen the size. Had bought a set of Larger Bears and they were no fun with the dropper they came with. Ended up trying different items to fill with Squeeze bottle and the best was a syringe I found @ CVS...May use but doubt it Me and the Grand Kids make enough of a mess using the larger ones
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These work great. I use the to make gummy treats for ...
customer_reviews.text: These work great. I use the to make gummy treats for my dogs. The treats pop out easily every time.
customer_reviews.author: BB28

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: I have not used this item. I bought as a gift but these are very tiny molds. I dont think it will be easy to remove gummies from the molds and the Bear design probably will be deformed or barely noticeable. Mold are made of a good silicone and there are no physical defects which is why I gave them a few stars.
customer_reviews.author: ERIKA

customer_reviews.title: You’ll be making gummy bear 24/7
customer_reviews.text: I use these molds to make sugar free gummy bears for my kids. When I first mentioned the idea to my wife she thought they would never eat them. All the kids love them, in fact my three year old ate them as I was popping them out of the mold.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Hatton

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint is that I didnt realize these were mini gummy bear molds but other than that, they are great quality, easy to clean and arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Sarheaa

customer_reviews.title: Too small to work well.
customer_reviews.text: Way to small to get the bears out and keep them looking like bears...
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked exactly as advertised. If made well the bears pop right out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use! I've been making gummy bears out of juice for my toddler and I have to admit that I eat most of them! These are pretty easy to fill although you do have to pop each one out which takes more time than filling them. The bears are a nice thickness and the definition is sharp. Washes perfectly clean in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Kari K.

customer_reviews.title: Molds are great
customer_reviews.text: Molds worked great. Baster that was included with molds was shattered into multiple pieces. Plastic all over molds when I received it.
customer_reviews.author: danny a. pineda

customer_reviews.title: Worked as expected! The dropper helps significantly! (I ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked as expected! The dropper helps significantly! (I did not think it was necessary, until I tried to use the molds without it!)
customer_reviews.author: DAB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these molds. They quite useful and handy but most importantly it makes anything look fun and appetizing.
customer_reviews.author: Greysi

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: These gummy bear molds are adorable! Each bear is measures 1/4 teaspoon. The molds were super easy to fill and popped out perfectly! I made Elderberry gummy bears and the kids think they are the cutest thing. My 12 year old helped me make them. Each mold makes 50 gummy bears.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Decent for price
customer_reviews.text: Pros:super easy to use and easy to clean Cons: very flimsy compared to other brands I've had before. I kept dropping gummys when I put them in the fridge . The gummies seem a little small but other than this it's a decent mold.
customer_reviews.author: kitty

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting and ant infested; wasted money // Updated
customer_reviews.text: The most disgusting package I've ever received. The dropper was full of ants and insect eggs as was the entirety of the envelope. Update:: was issued a refund without a problem!! I believe it was a fluke error that caused the problems. Would try to purchase again if I hadn't already gone to the store to purchase another product.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Flores

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sugar cubes!
customer_reviews.text: I use them for my sugar molds. I like making sugar cubes for friends and family and these are a perfect size and make cute colorful gifts for any tea user. Try the 1/4th cup sugar to 1 teaspoon water and give it a go!
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: The product works well and cleans up easily. The only thing I was not crazy about ...
customer_reviews.text: The product works well and cleans up easily. The only thing I was not crazy about is how small the bears actually are using this mold
customer_reviews.author: kminyard

customer_reviews.title: Yummy gummy bears!
customer_reviews.text: The dropper is definitely a great addition! If I had to do anything different I might get 2 so I could make them more in bulk!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Pulizzi

customer_reviews.title: These worked great! My 5 year old and I made homemade ...
customer_reviews.text: These worked great! My 5 year old and I made homemade gummies with these and the dopper was easy for him to use!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: happy with this order thank you
customer_reviews.text: Recieved my order very fast, happy with this order thank you
customer_reviews.author: Crystel

customer_reviews.title: Great for sugar free diets!
customer_reviews.text: These molds are great! I have a granddaughter with type 1 diabetes and she is thrilled to be able to have candy made from sugar free gelatin. We had great fun making these and she will have candy for her Easter basket!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to make elderberry gummies for my kids. These worked great. I just pop them in my dishwasher to clean. Makes a bunch of gummies and saving money too, so I'm happy!
customer_reviews.author: ladyO25

customer_reviews.title: Baby Bears not Regular Bears
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, the dropper is helpful also. The only thing is the size of the bears - they’re smaller than I expected, they are mini bears vs regular sized bears. Regardless I still really like the molds, and since they’re small bears I’ll likely purchase another set of these.
customer_reviews.author: Alyss

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. These are tiny gummy bears if you’re curious but still great!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gummies
customer_reviews.text: I bought these bear trays to make Keto gummy bears and they worked perfect...

customer_reviews.title: Smells horrible!
customer_reviews.text: I see these are made in China and received them today. They have a very very bad smell. Horrible! Sending them back.
customer_reviews.author: Knitter

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I use these as an ice cube tray so they can fit in any bottle I have, takes forever to fill them with the dropper provided but the result is worth it
customer_reviews.author: Jess Ruggles

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Arrived quickly. Easy to fill which is cool because there’s like a TON of bears to fill. I’m happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves using these to create different flavors. Easy to use and clean. Must buy.
customer_reviews.author: Aqua

customer_reviews.title: Gummy molds
customer_reviews.text: Love love these. I made some healthy gummies and they pop right out after they cool..will have to get more..
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bell

customer_reviews.title: Tiny bears.
customer_reviews.text: These are really small. Might be what you are looking for, but I wish I had purchased some that were a little larger.
customer_reviews.author: L. Suarez

customer_reviews.title: 3 molds and a baster
customer_reviews.text: I made my first batch of gummies today. Very easy to fill with included baster tool, also easy to pop out finished gummy. Clean up was simple too. Perfect little gummy size.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: Quality Molds, great price. I would advize getting a different dropper.
customer_reviews.text: These molds are excellent; very inexpensive, quality silicone. I recommend spraying with cooking spray before use; but they work great either way, and are very easy to clean. The included suction dropper is not very good, but the price is well worth it for the silicone molds themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Candies come out of the mold easily with no spray. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christina K.B

customer_reviews.title: Gummy mold
customer_reviews.text: The gummy bears molds was good but the recipe was bad
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Tavaras

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Molds!
customer_reviews.text: Love these molds! The gummy bears arms can get a little tricky to remove at times but once you know how to work with it, its much easier. Easy to clean and store.
customer_reviews.author: GlamUp&Sparkle

customer_reviews.title: Very fun; bears are small.
customer_reviews.text: Super fun; makes quite a few bears. Only complaint: bears are smaller than store-bought gummy bears. Silicone tends to cling to the smell of whatever it was used for.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Great silicone molds
customer_reviews.text: The molds themselves work perfectly but the dropper however doesn't work well. I look at the cheap dropper as a free throw in so I didn't lower my rating because of that but I will recommend using a syringe type dropper instead of the mini turkey baster types.
customer_reviews.author: Frank C.

customer_reviews.title: Small bears.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Good quality. If I were to do it again, I’d buy molds with a little larger bears. These were a little smaller than ‘regular’ gummy bears.
customer_reviews.author: JJackson

customer_reviews.title: Makes cute gummies
customer_reviews.text: The gummies didn’t come out whole until I left them in the mold for way longer than expected. Pretty easy to clean and the syringe is very helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Liddlenica

customer_reviews.title: So tiny
customer_reviews.text: These molds were awesome. Made gummies bears instantly after pulling them out of the mailbox. I wish there was better pictures of them because i wasnt expecting the finished product to be so small. Dropper and molds very easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.author: Anna Schoelzel

customer_reviews.title: Lots of choices for candy molds
customer_reviews.text: These molds aren't too bad. Similar to Michael's and Hobby Lobby.
customer_reviews.author: Ftlaudgirl

customer_reviews.title: I have been making harder candy more like fruit chews (not Gummy) and had trouble everything sticking ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been making harder candy more like fruit chews (not Gummy) and had trouble everything sticking together one I cut it or break them up. I used it for the first time today, works great comes out fine although i'm leaving them in so they don't stick together till my kids are ready to eat some. I do need to adjust my recipe or buy more molds i just end up with extra candy.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Awful. Ripped after one use.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality, horrible all around. Almost impossible to get out of the casting. Would not buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute and works a bit hard to clean but to be expected with tiny little bear holes

customer_reviews.title: No real issues
customer_reviews.text: The individual molds were a little on the small side, but easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These are great, easy to use and as good quality as any silicone baking gear that I have purchased. My 3,5&8yr old got the hang of it and were all able to do it “on their own.” Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: M.A.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to get the bears out!
customer_reviews.text: The bears are a bit smaller than ones from the store, but they did the trick making gummy bears. Super easy to peel off and clean

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Not standard size

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: The cut out for these are very small I thought they’d make bigger molds just smaller than what I expected
customer_reviews.author: Charity Carrier

customer_reviews.title: Great Gummy Molds
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Bears are of the smaller variety, but ejected from molds perfectly every time. Recommend buying a 30 or 60cc syringe for filling the molds rather than the dropper that comes with it. Gelatin has a tendency to clog the droppers and the syringe allows the back pressure to push the liquid through the small hole as it congeals.
customer_reviews.author: 6hopsaway

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, makes perfect bears!
customer_reviews.text: Works just like you think, simple to fill with the supplied dropper and very easy to push out. I use these with Knox gelatin to make gummies that go with my workout diet.
customer_reviews.author: Monique S.

customer_reviews.title: Love them. So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They are a little bit smaller than what I assumed they would be, but none the less perfect. They are very non stick silicone so they have been easy to clean out after each use. I am actually using them currently to make snail food.

customer_reviews.title: Very cute mold!

product_meta.title: Lizber Gummy Bear Molds 3 Pack , Silicone Candy Molds 50 Cavities with Bonus Dropper (Blue , Green , Red)
product_meta.description:
Size:AGet this 3 pcs silicone gummy bears candy molds for your little ones and the party! Using the dropper for a easy fill, and there you go! 150 yummy gummy bears are on trays! 

Making gummy candy bears, chocolates, jelly, Ice cubes etc, just as easy as pie! 

Includes: 
-3 x silicone gummy bear candy molds. Size: 7.5" x 5.5"
-50 cavities of each tray. Cavity size: 0.8" x 0.5" x 0.4"
-1 x dropper (5ml capacity)
feature_bullets: Great for making candy or other treats for the upcoming holiday. Perfect to make gummy bears , chocolate treats , candy bears , jelly , Ice cubes and mix your own ingredients for a healthy alternative snacks.
Comes with a dropper for easy fill, featured with non-stick silicone makes gummy bears pop out easily without cracking with detail face and cuddly arms.
Set of 3 x 50 cavities, making 150 yummy gummy bears at a time. Size: each tray is 7.5" x 5.5", each cavity is 0.8" x 0.5" x 0.4".
Includes: 3 pcs silicone gummy bear molds (blue, green, red), 1 dropper.
Made of 100% food grade silicone, FREE from BPA . Non-toxic and eco-friendly, easy to clean, safe for oven, freezer and dishwasher. Heat resistant up to -40F to 450F.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars867 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
